libjf-web-v1.jfconfig.title: LibJF Web v0
libjf-web-v1.jfconfig.serverIp.tooltip: The public IP/host name to send to clients
libjf-web-v1.jfconfig.port.tooltip: The port to host content on, 0 to choose a random one or -1 to reuse the minecraft port on servers (requires restart)
libjf-web-v1.jfconfig.portOverride.toolt: The port to send to clients (for reverse proxies, -1 to disable)
libjf-web-v1.jfconfig.maxConnections.too: The maximum number of concurrent connections to this server
libjf-web-v1.jfconfig.enableFileHost.too: Whether files from config/wwwroot should be hosted as static resources
